summary: Completed e2e testing of Admin Dashboard - Backend APIs 97% pass rate (28/29), Frontend UI 100% functional

minor.issue: Category creation returns 520/Internal Server Error when attempting to create and cleanup test category - MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in response

integration_issues.issue: Category names shown as 'Unknown' in the bar chart - likely due to category_id not matching admin_categories collection

issues: Console warnings: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - Recharts rendering issues during initial load
Console warnings: MUI Grid v1 props (item, xs, sm, md) are deprecated - need migration to Grid v2

action_items: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization in category creation response - need to exclude _id from insert result
Fix 'Listings by Category' chart showing 'Unknown' - category_id in listings may not match admin_categories collection IDs
Optional: Migrate MUI Grid from v1 to v2 syntax to remove deprecation warnings
Optional: Fix Recharts dimension warnings during initial render
critical_code_review_comments: Backend server.py has proper MongoDB _id exclusion with {'_id': 0} projections, but insert_one response handling may need adjustment
API client in frontend correctly handles auth token storage and 401 redirects
Audit logging is properly implemented for all admin actions
seed_data_creation: Using pre-seeded admin user and categories from initial database setup
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs fully tested via pytest, frontend tested via Playwright. All core flows work: login, dashboard, categories, users, listings, audit logs, tickets. The only backend issue is MongoDB ObjectId in category creation response. Dashboard shows real data from MongoDB.
tested_flows: List/Get categories with hierarchy and flat modes
List users with pagination, search, status filters
List listings with pagination, status filters
